title: 04/09/21 DPS Hour 2 Tom Curran
itunes:title: 04/09/21 DPS Hour 2 Tom Curran
description:
Tom Curran tells Dan that its not the "Patriot Way" to move up in the draft. Tom says the grade just is not there for the Patriots to move up to get Justin Fields.
